Dialogue.Page: The superweapon constructed by one of the surviving Nomai was delivered to, and contained within Dark Bramble - where they hoped ghost matter would be safely absorbed and neutralized by the bramble over time.
As it travelled into Dark Bramble, the superweapon's payload of ghost matter would protect it from - and inevitably, kill many anglerfishes as it travelled.

This culled the overpopulation of anglerfishes that made exploring the Dark Bramble impossible in the Nomai's time, and would clear the path for a Hearthian to reach the Nomai clan's derelict vessel millennia later.
We were never able to learn what was causing ghost matter to begin to evaporate.
